hero.title: Austrian AI Agency:
hero.subtitle: Innovative AI solutions
hero.description: We help companies implement modern artificial intelligence solutions for business automation, optimization, and scaling. Our experts create customized solutions tailored to your specific business needs.

services.title: Our Services

strategy.title: AI Strategy
strategy.description: We develop customized AI implementation strategies for your business, taking into account industry specifics and company needs.

development.title: Solution Development
development.description: We create custom AI applications, integrate existing models, and adapt them to your business processes.

training.title: Team Training
training.description: We train your employees to effectively use new AI tools and develop artificial intelligence skills.

services.subtitle: Tailored AI programs that move the metrics you care about

contactForm.title: Get in touch
contactForm.description: Leave your contact information and message, and we will get back to you soon.
contactForm.messagePlaceholder: Describe how we can help you...
contactForm.validationError: Please fill in all required fields
contactForm.emailError: Please enter a valid email address
contactForm.submitError: An error occurred. Please try again.
contactForm.successMessage: We have received your inquiry and will respond shortly.

innovation.title: Innovation Excellence
innovation.description: We leverage cutting-edge AI technologies to create future-ready solutions that drive real business transformation

expertise.title: Deep Technical Expertise
expertise.description: Our team comprises leading AI specialists with extensive experience in machine learning, deep learning, and enterprise AI deployment

support.title: Long-term Partnership
support.description: We stay with you throughout the entire journey — from initial concept to full implementation and ongoing optimization

chatBot.title: Chat with Austrian AI Agency ✨
chatBot.subtitle: Our virtual assistant will answer your questions
chatBot.greeting: Hello! How can I help you today? Feel free to ask about our AI services.
chatBot.response: Thank you for your message! Our AI specialists will review your inquiry and get back to you soon. If you have any other questions, please don't hesitate to ask.
chatBot.errorResponse: Sorry, an error occurred while processing your request. Please try again later.
chatBot.searchingInfo: Searching for information in our knowledge base...
chatBot.fallbackResponse: I couldn't find an exact answer to your question. Please clarify or ask a different question.
chatBot.rateLimit: Please wait a few seconds before sending another message.

hero.title: Tired of high electricity costs?
hero.subtitle: Join Austria's energy community and start saving today
hero.description: Every month, you overpay for electricity. Average Austrian households spend €150-250/month on energy. But there's a better way.

problem.title: The hidden costs in your electricity bill
problem.subtitle: Why traditional energy providers cost you more

point1.title: Constantly rising prices
point1.description: Energy prices have increased by 40% in the last two years, and traditional providers pass all costs to consumers

point2.title: Hidden fees
point2.description: Network fees, taxes, and additional charges make up to 60% of your bill

point3.title: No control
point3.description: You're locked into long-term contracts with no say in pricing or energy sources

solution.title: How energy communities change the game
solution.subtitle: A smarter way to consume electricity
solution.intro: Energy communities (Energiegemeinschaften) are a revolutionary concept where neighbors share locally produced renewable energy, cutting out middlemen and reducing costs.

benefit1.title: Direct savings
benefit1.description: Pay only 8¢/kWh for consumed electricity — significantly below market rates

benefit2.title: Full transparency
benefit2.description: See exactly where your energy comes from and how costs are calculated

benefit3.title: Sustainable future
benefit3.description: Support local renewable energy and reduce your carbon footprint

benefit4.title: Minimal commitment
benefit4.description: Join with just €10 deposit and €10 one-time membership fee

pricing.title: Simple, transparent pricing
pricing.subtitle: No hidden fees, no surprises

consumption.title: Consumption price
consumption.description: Pay only for what you use

pricing.comparison: Compare this to average market rates of 25-35¢/kWh

cta.title: Ready to start saving?
cta.subtitle: Join hundreds of Austrian households already benefiting from energy communities
cta.guarantee: Cancel anytime • No long-term contracts • 100% renewable energy
